wen kara athi mudalwalin sulu warimarga prathisanskaranaya kala nohaki bawata chodana kala hambanthota disthrik manthri sajith premadasa mahathata labana 31 dina hambanthota attikka amuna aarambha karana awasthawata sahabhagi wana lesa kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha mahatha eeye (27) parlimenthuwedi wiwrutha arayumak kaleya.mewara ayawayen lankawe pihiti 25,000k pamana wana sulu warimarga nadaththu kala nohaki bawata kala chodanawata warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha lankawe athi siyalu ma sulu warimarga ek wasarak thula prathisanskaranaya kala nohaki bawath ese kiwa hakke manankalpitha deshapalakayanta pamanak bawata dun pilithurata madihath wemini.ekawara siyalu warmarga kala nohaki bawath injineruwan, thakshana niladharin, kamkaruwange hingaya balapana bawath pramukhathawa anuwa awashya eewa prathisanskaranaya karana bawa ki amathiwaraya ejapaya kalaye sulu warimarga athahara dama thibu bawath ee sandaha rupiyal 100k wen nokala bawath kiya.sulu warimarga nadaththuwata wenama anshayak pawathwa gena yana bawath thama amathyanshayata amatharawa palath sabha ha gowijana sewa departhamenthuwa warimarga nadaththu karana bawa ki amathiwaraya rajaye warimarga wadapiliwela samastha gowi janathawa sathutu kirima wuwath premadasa mahatha sathutata path karanna maha sakrayatawath nohaki bawa kiya.

panas ek hawiridi ohu nawathama bond sinamapataya wu ‘skayifol’, ‘mag wich’, ‘gret ekspekteshan’ ranganayanwalin da mathakadi janapriya wiya.* ‘da pashan of da krayist’ – jim kawisalhathalis pas hawiridi amerikanu naluwa wadath janapriya wuye ‘da pashan of da krayist’ ranganayeni.* ‘da gospal of jon’ - henri iyan kusikhathalis haya hawiridiya.* ‘jisas krayist supar star’ – amerikanu nalu gayaka ted niledan 70 hawiridiya.
